Class WorkItemTextUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.workitem.common.text.WorkItemTextUtilities

public class WorkItemTextUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Some utility methods for getting textual representations for a work item.

getWorkItemText

public static java.lang.String getWorkItemText(IWorkItem workitem,
                                               int maxLength)
Returns the textual representation of the given work item. HTML markup is removed and the length is restricted to the given maximum length.

Parameters:
workitem - the work item
maxLength - the maximum length
Returns:
the textual representation
